A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is an epic fail!  Rian Johnson had an opportunity to do something great and decided to write the script in crayon.  The plot\, character development and continuity was horrible.  We learned nothing from this movie.  All of the questions from the awesomely directed Force Awakens were not answered.  This movie is more stand alone then Rogue one was and definitely not as good. I gave the movie 2 stars for some fun moments.  Other than that this movie and starship literally run out of gas and crash and burn.  So disappointed.  I really hope JJ can save what he started and give us an epic ending.
